DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety vaccine immune response vaccine healthy adult volunteer 65 year age old . Volunteers assign randomization receive either vaccine inactive substance ( placebo ) injection arm two occasion one month . The study last approximately 10 month total 7 visit .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Immunogenicity Trial Adults 65 Years Age Over Prevent Influenza
DOC.criteria: Age 65 year age older Good general health without significant physical examination finding clinically significant abnormal laboratory result Available participate entire study period Acceptable laboratory parameter Willingness blood store 10 year use additional assay evaluate immune response influenza alphavirus vector assay become available Willingness refrain donate blood participate study Willingness delay receipt 20082009 license influenza vaccination complete study visit 6 procedure ( study week 8 ) Signed inform consent obtain screen enrollment Venous access deem inadequate th phlebotomy demand study Receipt vaccine within 30 day prior enrollment Use investigational agent within 30 day prior enrollment Receipt immunoglobulin blood product within 60 day prior enrollment Use cytotoxic medication within 6 month prior enrollment Use systemic corticosteroid within 6 month prior enrollment ( except participant complete course prednisone , 20 mg per day 7 day , least 1 month prior enrollment eligible enrollment ) History serious adverse reaction vaccine , include anaphylaxis relate symptom hive , respiratory difficulty , angioedema , abdominal pain History autoimmune disease splenectomy History malignancy within last 3 year ( except participant diagnosis basal cell carcinoma skin eligible enrollment ) Psychiatric condition may interfere ability comply protocol requirement understand informed consent . Specifically excluded person history psychosis within past 3 year history suicidal attempt gesture within past 3 year . History medical , occupational , family problem result alcohol illicit drug use past 12 month Any condition lead investigator believe particpant comply protocol requirement may place participant unacceptable risk participation .
